summary:
Take the ever lovely Lifts-Her-Tail with you on your adventures. Circumstance has guided her from Black Marsh, all the way through Morrowind, into Skyrim and she is looking for company. Will you oblige?

Find her near the gate of Riften!
descriptionHtml:
---DESCRIPTION---

Lifts-Her-Tail has come all the way from Black Marsh to Skyrim to find herself. With her journey at an end, she\'s looking for a new adventure. Will you let her tag along? Find her near the gate and stables of Riften.

Make sure to read the journal she carries with her, this young lass has come a long way.


---INSTALLATION---

1. Click \'\'Download with Manager\'\'.

2. Activate the mod in the mod manager.

3. You\'re done!




Also see \'\'Lusty Argonian Maid and Sultry Argonian Bard - The Untold Story\'\'
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27616/#content
author: BlackPuma
